src_original: 16704 catvāri dhyānāni viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
16705 savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam {upasaṃpadya viharati}/  vitarkavicārāṇāṃ
tgt_original: 有尋有伺離生喜樂。 入於初禪得圓滿住。

src_original: 16706 vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ samprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ  16707 prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam {upasaṃpadya viharati}/
tgt_original: 除滅尋伺內淨一心。 無尋無伺定生喜樂。 入第二禪得圓滿住。

src_original: prīter virāgād upekṣakaś ca viharati smṛtimān
tgt_original: 離喜住捨有念正知身受樂諸聖所說能捨有念受樂。

src_original: sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt  16710 pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ
tgt_original: 斷樂先除苦憂喜已滅。 不苦不樂捨念清淨。

src_original: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāt
16712 nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam iti ākāśānantyāyatanam {upasaṃpadya viharati}/
tgt_original: 不念種種想入無邊虛空。
